long_description: The MTI Reflex PFD for kids offers pint-size paddlers a chance to join in on the fun with a comfortable and secure PFD. MTI recommends the kids' Reflex PFD for children weighing 50 - 90 lbs. and the approximate ages of 5 - 10 yrs. Made from abrasion-resistant polyester for lasting service; soft foam flotation provides 11 lbs. of tireless buoyancy. With 7 points of adjustment that include fully adjustable shoulder, waist and side straps, fit can easily be adjusted to match a growing child. Reflective tape accents on front, back and shoulders enhance visibility in low light. Wide armholes allow full range of movement without binding. Center zip design is easy for kids to put on.
short_description: The MTI Reflex PFD for kids offers pint-size paddlers a chance to join in on the fun with a comfortable and secure PFD.
